readable.content: A kid in purple is doing a skateboard trick . A man in a purple shirt attempts tricks with a skateboard inside a heavily graffiti painted area . A man in a purple shirt is skateboarding in a graffiti-heavy area . A person grinding a ledge on a skateboard . A person wearing a blue hat rides a skateboard off of a cement bench .
